item.title: How to publish Go documentation to the go.dev package repository
item.description: In this brief post I am going to show you how to automatically publish your Go doc library to Go package repository using Github action build pipeline. You do not need to generate documentation of your code locally then push it to repository. All you need is to let the Go package repository where your library is hosted then it will link it automatically. All it is needed is to run the following command from your local machine
